title: PLC Workshop for Strengthening Design Thinking-Based Math Instructional Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental concepts of mathematics education and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Real-time collaboration and iterative learning design using mobile apps in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Collaborate with PLC members to define mathematics instruction problems and derive solutions through a three-stage design thinking process
Specify at least two personalized mathematics instructional designs based on student learning data analysis
Design at least one formative assessment and implement a feedback loop on a mobile microlearning platform
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
